title: Bug 5340: Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When attempting to add an exception breakpoint and cancelling the operation, the progress dialog closes immediately. Eventually, the exception list appears, ignoring the cancellation request.
EB: The progress dialog should not close immediately when cancelling the operation. It should either honor the cancellation request or disable the cancel button. When calling ProgressMonitorDialog.run, false should be passed for the 'cancellable' parameter.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the exception breakpoint dialog.
2. Add an exception breakpoint.
3. Click on the cancel button during the progress dialog.
